title: Out-of-Distribution Detection Using Knowledge Distillation
details: Ľ Králik, P Tarábek - 2025 35th International Conference Radioelektronika …, 2025
abstract: Out-of-distribution (OOD) samples pose a critical challenge for deep neural networks deployed in real-world applications, as they can lead to unreliable or incorrect predictions. This paper introduces a novel method for OOD detection based on …
